content: Hey, remember on Amazon Prime day when everyone flipped over Instant Pots (because they're freaking amazing)? Well, the eight quart and the six quart pots are still on sale from Black Friday — start planning your recipes now. SEE ALSO: These are the best deals on Amazon's home tech devices for Black Friday The Instant Pot Duo is a number one best selling multi-cooker, and with nine kitchen functions in one, that's no surprise. It's a pressure cooker, a slow cooker, a rice and egg cooker, a steamer, a food warmer, a yogurt maker, sterilizer, and it sautés — 70% faster than traditional appliances. All of that, with the six quart capacity to feed, like, an entire party of people. It's usually $119.95, but you can snag it today for a whopping $45 off at just $74.95 .  Image: instantpot Save $45 on the Instant Pot DUO Plus: 6 QT 9-in-1 Programmable Pressure Cooker See Details Six quarts a little too small for your needs? No worries — Instant Pot let some deals from Black Friday flow into Cyber Monday and are offering 15% off the eight quart Instant Pot DUO as well. Same same infinite drool-worthy options, but bigger. Get it for $19.46 off at $110.49 here . Image: instantpot Save $19 on the Instant Pot DUO80: 8 QT 7-in-1 Programmable Pressure Cooker See Details Tired of keeping tabs of the temperature every time you cook? The 8-in-1 Instant Pot Gem offers some seriously customizable cooking and baking. It remembers the most recently used settings per cooking program for a more personalized experience and offers the highest heat in the multi-cooker collection. It features a built-in microprocessor that carefully monitors the temperature and timer to ensure consistent cooking results. Get it for $16 off at $63 here . The Instant Pot everyone went crazy over on Black Friday is on sale again for Cyber Monday

Share
Tweet
What's This?
Just to let you know, if you buy something featured here, Mashable might earn an affiliate commission.
By Leah StodartMashable Deals2017-11-24 13:11:12 UTC

Hey, remember on Amazon Prime day when everyone flipped over Instant Pots (because they're freaking amazing)? Well, the eight quart and the six quart pots are still on sale from Black Friday — start planning your recipes now.

SEE ALSO: These are the best deals on Amazon's home tech devices for Black Friday

The Instant Pot Duo is a number one best selling multi-cooker, and with nine kitchen functions in one, that's no surprise. It's a pressure cooker, a slow cooker, a rice and egg cooker, a steamer, a food warmer, a yogurt maker, sterilizer, and it sautés — 70% faster than traditional appliances. All of that, with the six quart capacity to feed, like, an entire party of people. It's usually $119.95, but you can snag it today for a whopping $45 off at just $74.95. 




Save $45 on the Instant Pot DUO Plus: 6 QT 9-in-1 Programmable Pressure Cooker
See Details

Six quarts a little too small for your needs? No worries — Instant Pot let some deals from Black Friday flow into Cyber Monday and are offering 15% off the eight quart Instant Pot DUO as well. Same same infinite drool-worthy options, but bigger. Get it for $19.46 off at $110.49 here.




Save $19 on the Instant Pot DUO80: 8 QT 7-in-1 Programmable Pressure Cooker
See Details

Tired of keeping tabs of the temperature every time you cook? The 8-in-1 Instant Pot Gem offers some seriously customizable cooking and baking. It remembers the most recently used settings per cooking program for a more personalized experience and offers the highest heat in the multi-cooker collection. It features a built-in microprocessor that carefully monitors the temperature and timer to ensure consistent cooking results. Get it for $16 off at $63 here.




Save $16 on the Instant Pot Gem: 8-in-1 6 QT Programmable Pressure Cooker
See Details
